i >= 0; i--) {\r\n        var range = ranges[indices[i]];\r\n        if (at && CodeMirror.cmpPos(range.head, at) > 0) continue;\r\n        var word = wordAt(cm, range.head);\r\n        at = word.from;\r\n        cm.replaceRange(mod(word.word), word.from, word.to);\r\n      }\r\n    });\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  mapK[ctrl + \"Backspace\"] = \"delLineLeft\";\r\n\r\n  cmds[mapK[ctrl + \"K\"] = \"delLineRight\"] = function(cm) {\r\n    cm.operation(function() {\r\n      var ranges = cm.listSelections();\r\n      for (var i = ranges.length - 1; i >= 0; i--)\r\n        cm.replaceRange(\"\", ranges[i].anchor, Pos(ranges[i].to().line), \"+delete\");\r\n      cm.scrollIntoView();\r\n    });\r\n  };\r\n\r\n  cmds[mapK[ctrl + \"U\"] = \"upcaseAtCursor\"] = function(cm) {\r\n    modifyWordOrSelection(cm, function(str) { return str.toUpperCase(); });\r\n  };\r\n  cmds[mapK[ctrl + \"L\"] = \"downcaseAtCursor\"] = function(cm) {\r\n    modifyWordOrSelection(cm, function(str) { return str.toLowerCase(); });\r\n  };\r\n\r\n  cmds[mapK[ctrl + \"Space\"] = \"setSublimeMark\"] = function(cm) {\r\n    if (cm.state.sublimeMark) cm.state.sublimeMark.clear();\r\n    cm.state.sublimeMark = cm.setBookmark(cm.getCursor());\r\n  };\r\n  cmds[mapK[ctrl + \"A\"] = \"selectToSublimeMark\"] = function(cm) {\r\n    var found = cm.state.sublimeMark && cm.state.sublimeMark.find();\r\n    if (found) cm.setSelection(cm.getCursor(), found);\r\n  };\r\n  cmds[mapK[ctrl + \"W\"] = \"deleteToSublimeMark\"] = function(cm) {\r\n    var found = cm.state.sublimeMark && cm.state.sublimeMark.find();\r\n    if (found) {\r\n      var from = cm.getCursor(), to = found;\r\n      if (CodeMirror.cmpPos(from, to) > 0) { var tmp = to; to = from; from = tmp; }\r\n      cm.state.sublimeKilled = cm.getRange(from, to);\r\n      cm.replaceRange(\"\", from, to);\r\n    }\r\n  };\r\n  cmds[mapK[ctrl + \"X\"] = \"swapWithSublimeMark\"] = function(cm) {\r\n    var found = cm.state.sublimeMark && cm.state.sublimeMark.find();\r\n    if (found) {\r\n      cm.state.sublimeMark.clear();\r\n      cm.state.sublimeMark = cm.setBookmark(cm.getCursor());\r\n      cm.setCursor(found);\r\n    }\r\n  };\r\n  cmds[mapK[ctrl + \"Y\"] = \"sublimeYank\"] = function(cm) {\r\n    if (cm.state.sublimeKilled != null)\r\n      cm.replaceSelection(cm.state.sublimeKilled, null, \"paste\");\r\n  };\r\n\r\n  mapK[ctrl + \"G\"] = \"clearBookmarks\";\r\n  cmds[mapK[ctrl + \"C\"] = \"showInCenter\"] = function(cm) {\r\n    var pos = cm.cursorCoords(null, \"local\");\r\n    cm.scrollTo(null, (pos.top + pos.bottom) / 2 - cm.getScrollInfo().clientHeight / 2);\r\n  };\r\n\r\n  cmds[map[\"Shift-Alt-Up\"] = \"selectLinesUpward\"] = function(cm) {\r\n    cm.operation(function() {\r\n      var ranges = cm.listSelections();\r\n      for (var i = 0; i < ranges.length; i++) {\r\n        var range = ranges[i];\r\n        if (range.head.line > cm.firstLine())\r\n          cm.addSelection(Pos(range.head.line - 1, range.head.ch));\r\n      }\r\n    });\r\n  };\r\n  cmds[map[\"Shift-Alt-Down\"] = \"selectLinesDownward\"] = function(cm) {\r\n    cm.operation(function() {\r\n      var ranges = cm.listSelections();\r\n      for (var i = 0; i < ranges.length; i++) {\r\n        var range = ranges[i];\r\n        if (range.head.line < cm.lastLine())\r\n          cm.addSelection(Pos(range.head.line + 1, range.head.ch));\r\n      }\r\n    });\r\n  };\r\n\r\n  function findAndGoTo(cm, forward) {\r\n    var from = cm.getCursor(\"from\"), to = cm.getCursor(\"to\");\r\n    if (CodeMirror.cmpPos(from, to) == 0) {\r\n      var word = wordAt(cm, from);\r\n      if (!word.word) return;\r\n      from = word.from;\r\n      to = word.to;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    var query = cm.getRange(from, to);\r\n    var cur = cm.getSearchCursor(query, forward ? to : from);\r\n\r\n    if (forward ? cur.findNext() : cur.findPrevious()) {\r\n      cm.setSelection(cur.from(), cur.to());\r\n    } else {\r\n      cur = cm.getSearchCursor(query, forward ? Pos(cm.firstLine(), 0)\r\n                                              : cm.clipPos(Pos(cm.lastLine())));\r\n      if (forward ? cur.findNext() : cur.findPrevious())\r\n        cm.setSelection(cur.from(), cur.to());\r\n      else if (word)\r\n        cm.setSelection(from, to);\r\n    }\r\n  };\r\n  cmds[map[ctrl + \"F3\"] = \"findUnder\"] = function(cm) { findAndGoTo(cm, true); };\r\n  cmds[map[\"Shift-\" + ctrl + \"F3\"] = \"findUnderPrevious\"] = function(cm) { findAndGoTo(cm,false); };\r\n\r\n  map[\"Shift-\" + ctrl + \"[\"] = \"fold\";\r\n  map[\"Shift-\" + ctrl + \"]\"] = \"unfold\";\r\n  mapK[ctrl + \"0\"] = mapK[ctrl + \"j\"] = \"unfoldAll\";\r\n\r\n  map[ctrl + \"I\"] = \"findIncremental\";\r\n  map[\"Shift-\" + ctrl + \"I\"] = \"findIncrementalReverse\";\r\n  map[ctrl + \"H\"] = \"replace\";\r\n  map[\"F3\"] = \"findNext\";\r\n  map[\"Shift-F3\"] = \"findPrev\";\r\n\r\n});\r\n"
        },
        "$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror/keymap/emacs.js": {
            "type": "application/javascript",
            "title": "$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror/keymap/emacs.js",
            "module-type": "library",
            "text": "(function(mod) {\r\n  if (typeof exports == \"object\" && typeof module == \"object\") // CommonJS\r\n    mod(require(\"../lib/codemirror\"));\r\n  else if (typeof define == \"function\" && define.amd) // AMD\r\n    define([\"../lib/codemirror\"], mod);\r\n  else // Plain browser env\r\n    mod(CodeMirror);\r\n})(function(CodeMirror) {\r\n  \"use strict\";\r\n\r\n  var Pos = CodeMirror.Pos;\r\n  function posEq(a, b) { return a.line == b.line && a.ch == b.ch; }\r\n\r\n  // Kill 'ring'\r\n\r\n  var killRing = [];\r\n  function addToRing(str) {\r\n    killRing.push(str);\r\n    if (killRing.length > 50) killRing.shift();\r\n  }\r\n  function growRingTop(str) {\r\n    if (!killRing.length) return addToRing(str);\r\n    killRing[killRing.length - 1] += str;\r\n  }\r\n  function getFromRing(n) { return killRing[killRing.length - (n ? Math.min(n, 1) : 1)] || \"\"; }\r\n  function popFromRing() { if (killRing.length > 1) killRing.pop(); return getFromRing(); }\r\n\r\n  var lastKill = null;\r\n\r\n  function kill(cm, from, to, mayGrow, text) {\r\n    if (text == null) text = cm.getRange(from, to);\r\n\r\n    if (mayGrow && lastKill && lastKill.cm == cm && posEq(from, lastKill.pos) && cm.isClean(lastKill.gen))\r\n      growRingTop(text);\r\n    else\r\n      addToRing(text);\r\n    cm.replaceRange(\"\", from, to, \"+delete\");\r\n\r\n    if (mayGrow) lastKill = {cm: cm, pos: from, gen: cm.changeGeneration()};\r\n    else lastKill = null;\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  // Boundaries of various units\r\n\r\n  function byChar(cm, pos, dir) {\r\n    return cm.findPosH(pos, dir, \"char\", true);\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  function byWord(cm, pos, dir) {\r\n    return cm.findPosH(pos, dir, \"word\", true);\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  function byLine(cm, pos, dir) {\r\n    return cm.findPosV(pos, dir, \"line\", cm.doc.sel.goalColumn);\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  function byPage(cm, pos, dir) {\r\n    return cm.findPosV(pos, dir, \"page\", cm.doc.sel.goalColumn);\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  function byParagraph(cm, pos, dir) {\r\n    var no = pos.line, line = cm.getLine(no);\r\n    var sawText = /\\S/.test(dir < 0 ? line.slice(0, pos.ch) : line.slice(pos.ch));\r\n    var fst = cm.firstLine(), lst = cm.lastLine();\r\n    for (;;) {\r\n      no += dir;\r\n      if (no < fst || no > lst)\r\n        return cm.clipPos(Pos(no - dir, dir < 0 ? 0 : null));\r\n      line = cm.getLine(no);\r\n      var hasText = /\\S/.test(line);\r\n      if (hasText) sawText = true;\r\n      else if (sawText) return Pos(no, 0);\r\n    }\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  function bySentence(cm, pos, dir) {\r\n    var line = pos.line, ch = pos.ch;\r\n    var text = cm.getLine(pos.line), sawWord = false;\r\n    for (;;) {\r\n      var next = text.charAt(ch + (dir < 0 ? -1 : 0));\r\n      if (!next) { // End/beginning of line reached\r\n        if (line == (dir < 0 ? cm.firstLine() : cm.lastLine())) return Pos(line, ch);\r\n        text = cm.getLine(line + dir);\r\n        if (!/\\S/.test(text)) return Pos(line, ch);\r\n        line += dir;\r\n        ch = dir < 0 ? text.length : 0;\r\n        continue;\r\n      }\r\n      if (sawWord && /[!?.]/.test(next)) return Pos(line, ch + (dir > 0 ? 1 : 0));\r\n      if (!sawWord) sawWord = /\\w/.test(next);\r\n      ch += dir;\r\n    }\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  function byExpr(cm, pos, dir) {\r\n    var wrap;\r\n    if (cm.findMatchingBracket && (wrap = cm.findMatchingBracket(pos, true))\r\n        && wrap.match && (wrap.forward ? 1 : -1) == dir)\r\n      return dir > 0 ? Pos(wrap.to.line, wrap.to.ch + 1) : wrap.to;\r\n\r\n    for (var first = true;; first = false) {\r\n      var token = cm.getTokenAt(pos);\r\n      var after = Pos(pos.line, dir < 0 ? token.start : token.end);\r\n      if (first && dir > 0 && token.end == pos.ch || !/\\w/.test(token.string)) {\r\n        var newPos = cm.findPosH(after, dir, \"char\");\r\n        if (posEq(after, newPos)) return pos;\r\n        else pos = newPos;\r\n      } else {\r\n        return after;\r\n      }\r\n    }\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  // Prefixes (only crudely supported)\r\n\r\n  function getPrefix(cm, precise) {\r\n    var digits = cm.state.emacsPrefix;\r\n    if (!digits) return precise ? null : 1;\r\n    clearPrefix(cm);\r\n    return digits == \"-\" ? -1 : Number(digits);\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  function repeated(cmd) {\r\n    var f = typeof cmd == \"string\" ? function(cm) { cm.execCommand(cmd); } : cmd;\r\n    return function(cm) {\r\n      var prefix = getPrefix(cm);\r\n      f(cm);\r\n      for (var i = 1; i < prefix; ++i) f(cm);\r\n    };\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  function findEnd(cm, by, dir) {\r\n    var pos = cm.getCursor(), prefix = getPrefix(cm);\r\n    if (prefix < 0) { dir = -dir; prefix = -prefix; }\r\n    for (var i = 0; i < prefix; ++i) {\r\n      var newPos = by(cm, pos, dir);\r\n      if (posEq(newPos, pos)) break;\r\n      pos = newPos;\r\n    }\r\n    return pos;\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  function move(by, dir) {\r\n    var f = function(cm) {\r\n      cm.extendSelection(findEnd(cm, by, dir));\r\n    };\r\n    f.motion = true;\r\n    return f;\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  function killTo(cm, by, dir) {\r\n    kill(cm, cm.getCursor(), findEnd(cm, by, dir), true);\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  function addPrefix(cm, digit) {\r\n    if (cm.state.emacsPrefix) {\r\n      if (digit != \"-\") cm.state.emacsPrefix += digit;\r\n      return;\r\n    }\r\n    // Not active yet\r\n    cm.state.emacsPrefix = digit;\r\n    cm.on(\"keyHandled\", maybeClearPrefix);\r\n    cm.on(\"inputRead\", maybeDuplicateInput);\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  var prefixPreservingKeys = {\"Alt-G\": true, \"Ctrl-X\": true, \"Ctrl-Q\": true, \"Ctrl-U\": true};\r\n\r\n  function maybeClearPrefix(cm, arg) {\r\n    if (!cm.state.emacsPrefixMap && !prefixPreservingKeys.hasOwnProperty(arg))\r\n      clearPrefix(cm);\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  function clearPrefix(cm) {\r\n    cm.state.emacsPrefix = null;\r\n    cm.off(\"keyHandled\", maybeClearPrefix);\r\n    cm.off(\"inputRead\", maybeDuplicateInput);\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  function maybeDuplicateInput(cm, event) {\r\n    var dup = getPrefix(cm);\r\n    if (dup > 1 && event.origin == \"+input\") {\r\n      var one = event.text.join(\"\\n\"), txt = \"\";\r\n      for (var i = 1; i < dup; ++i) txt += one;\r\n      cm.replaceSelection(txt);\r\n    }\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  function addPrefixMap(cm) {\r\n    cm.state.emacsPrefixMap = true;\r\n    cm.addKeyMap(prefixMap);\r\n    cm.on(\"keyHandled\", maybeRemovePrefixMap);\r\n    cm.on(\"inputRead\", maybeRemovePrefixMap);\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  function maybeRemovePrefixMap(cm, arg) {\r\n    if (typeof arg == \"string\" && (/^\\d$/.test(arg) || arg == \"Ctrl-U\")) return;\r\n    cm.removeKeyMap(prefixMap);\r\n    cm.state.emacsPrefixMap = false;\r\n    cm.off(\"keyHandled\", maybeRemovePrefixMap);\r\n    cm.off(\"inputRead\", maybeRemovePrefixMap);\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  // Utilities\r\n\r\n  function setMark(cm) {\r\n    cm.setCursor(cm.getCursor());\r\n    cm.setExtending(!cm.getExtending());\r\n    cm.on(\"change\", function() { cm.setExtending(false); });\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  function clearMark(cm) {\r\n    cm.setExtending(false);\r\n    cm.setCursor(cm.getCursor());\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  function getInput(cm, msg, f) {\r\n    if (cm.openDialog)\r\n      cm.openDialog(msg + \": <input type=\\\"text\\\" style=\\\"width: 10em\\\"/>\", f, {bottom: true});\r\n    else\r\n      f(prompt(msg, \"\"));\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  function operateOnWord(cm, op) {\r\n    var start = cm.getCursor(), end = cm.findPosH(start, 1, \"word\");\r\n    cm.replaceRange(op(cm.getRange(start, end)), start, end);\r\n    cm.setCursor(end);\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  function toEnclosingExpr(cm) {\r\n    var pos = cm.getCursor(), line = pos.line, ch = pos.ch;\r\n    var stack = [];\r\n    while (line >= cm.firstLine()) {\r\n      var text = cm.getLine(line);\r\n      for (var i = ch == null ? text.length : ch; i > 0;) {\r\n        var ch = text.charAt(--i);\r\n        if (ch == \")\")\r\n          stack.push(\"(\");\r\n        else if (ch == \"]\")\r\n          stack.push(\"[\");\r\n        else if (ch == \"}\")\r\n          stack.push(\"{\");\r\n        else if (/[\\(\\{\\[]/.test(ch) && (!stack.length || stack.pop() != ch))\r\n          return cm.extendSelection(Pos(line, i));\r\n      }\r\n      --line; ch = null;\r\n    }\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  function quit(cm) {\r\n    cm.execCommand(\"clearSearch\");\r\n    clearMark(cm);\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  // Actual keymap\r\n\r\n  var keyMap = CodeMirror.keyMap.emacs = {\r\n    \"Ctrl-W\": function(cm) {kill(cm, cm.getCursor(\"start\"), cm.getCursor(\"end\"));},\r\n    \"Ctrl-K\": repeated(function(cm) {\r\n      var start = cm.getCursor(), end = cm.clipPos(Pos(start.line));\r\n      var text = cm.getRange(start, end);\r\n      if (!/\\S/.test(text)) {\r\n        text += \"\\n\";\r\n        end = Pos(start.line + 1, 0);\r\n      }\r\n      kill(cm, start, end, true, text);\r\n    }),\r\n    \"Alt-W\": function(cm) {\r\n      addToRing(cm.getSelection());\r\n      clearMark(cm);\r\n    },\r\n    \"Ctrl-Y\": function(cm) {\r\n      var start = cm.getCursor();\r\n      cm.replaceRange(getFromRing(getPrefix(cm)), start, start, \"paste\");\r\n      cm.setSelection(start, cm.getCursor());\r\n    },\r\n    \"Alt-Y\": function(cm) {cm.replaceSelection(popFromRing(), \"around\", \"paste\");},\r\n\r\n    \"Ctrl-Space\": setMark, \"Ctrl-Shift-2\": setMark,\r\n\r\n    \"Ctrl-F\": move(byChar, 1), \"Ctrl-B\": move(byChar, -1),\r\n    \"Right\": move(byChar, 1), \"Left\": move(byChar, -1),\r\n    \"Ctrl-D\": function(cm) { killTo(cm, byChar, 1); },\r\n    \"Delete\": function(cm) { killTo(cm, byChar, 1); },\r\n    \"Ctrl-H\": function(cm) { killTo(cm, byChar, -1); },\r\n    \"Backspace\": function(cm) { killTo(cm, byChar, -1); },\r\n\r\n    \"Alt-F\": move(byWord, 1), \"Alt-B\": move(byWord, -1),\r\n    \"Alt-D\": function(cm) { killTo(cm, byWord, 1); },\r\n    \"Alt-Backspace\": function(cm) { killTo(cm, byWord, -1); },\r\n\r\n    \"Ctrl-N\": move(byLine, 1), \"Ctrl-P\": move(byLine, -1),\r\n    \"Down\": move(byLine, 1), \"Up\": move(byLine, -1),\r\n    \"Ctrl-A\": \"goLineStart\", \"Ctrl-E\": \"goLineEnd\",\r\n    \"End\": \"goLineEnd\", \"Home\": \"goLineStart\",\r\n\r\n    \"Alt-V\": move(byPage, -1), \"Ctrl-V\": move(byPage, 1),\r\n    \"PageUp\": move(byPage, -1), \"PageDown\": move(byPage, 1),\r\n\r\n    \"Ctrl-Up\": move(byParagraph, -1), \"Ctrl-Down\": move(byParagraph, 1),\r\n\r\n    \"Alt-A\": move(bySentence, -1), \"Alt-E\": move(bySentence, 1),\r\n    \"Alt-K\": function(cm) { killTo(cm, bySentence, 1); },\r\n\r\n    \"Ctrl-Alt-K\": function(cm) { killTo(cm, byExpr, 1); },\r\n    \"Ctrl-Alt-Backspace\": function(cm) { killTo(cm, byExpr, -1); },\r\n    \"Ctrl-Alt-F\": move(byExpr, 1), \"Ctrl-Alt-B\": move(byExpr, -1),\r\n\r\n    \"Shift-Ctrl-Alt-2\": function(cm) {\r\n      cm.setSelection(findEnd(cm, byExpr, 1), cm.getCursor());\r\n    },\r\n    \"Ctrl-Alt-T\": function(cm) {\r\n      var leftStart = byExpr(cm, cm.getCursor(), -1), leftEnd = byExpr(cm, leftStart, 1);\r\n      var rightEnd = byExpr(cm, leftEnd, 1), rightStart = byExpr(cm, rightEnd, -1);\r\n      cm.replaceRange(cm.getRange(rightStart, rightEnd) + cm.getRange(leftEnd, rightStart) +\r\n                      cm.getRange(leftStart, leftEnd), leftStart, rightEnd);\r\n    },\r\n    \"Ctrl-Alt-U\": repeated(toEnclosingExpr),\r\n\r\n    \"Alt-Space\": function(cm) {\r\n      var pos = cm.getCursor(), from = pos.ch, to = pos.ch, text = cm.getLine(pos.line);\r\n      while (from && /\\s/.test(text.charAt(from - 1))) --from;\r\n      while (to < text.length && /\\s/.test(text.charAt(to))) ++to;\r\n      cm.replaceRange(\" \", Pos(pos.line, from), Pos(pos.line, to));\r\n    },\r\n    \"Ctrl-O\": repeated(function(cm) { cm.replaceSelection(\"\\n\", \"start\"); }),\r\n    \"Ctrl-T\": repeated(function(cm) {\r\n      cm.execCommand(\"transposeChars\");\r\n    }),\r\n\r\n    \"Alt-C\": repeated(function(cm) {\r\n      operateOnWord(cm, function(w) {\r\n        var letter = w.search(/\\w/);\r\n        if (letter == -1) return w;\r\n        return w.slice(0, letter) + w.charAt(letter).toUpperCase() + w.slice(letter + 1).toLowerCase();\r\n      });\r\n    }),\r\n    \"Alt-U\": repeated(function(cm) {\r\n      operateOnWord(cm, function(w) { return w.toUpperCase(); });\r\n    }),\r\n    \"Alt-L\": repeated(function(cm) {\r\n      operateOnWord(cm, function(w) { return w.toLowerCase(); });\r\n    }),\r\n\r\n    \"Alt-;\": \"toggleComment\",\r\n\r\n    \"Ctrl-/\": repeated(\"undo\"), \"Shift-Ctrl--\": repeated(\"undo\"),\r\n    \"Ctrl-Z\": repeated(\"undo\"), \"Cmd-Z\": repeated(\"undo\"),\r\n    \"Shift-Alt-,\": \"goDocStart\", \"Shift-Alt-.\": \"goDocEnd\",\r\n    \"Ctrl-S\": \"findNext\", \"Ctrl-R\": \"findPrev\", \"Ctrl-G\": quit, \"Shift-Alt-5\": \"replace\",\r\n    \"Alt-/\": \"autocomplete\",\r\n    \"Ctrl-J\": \"newlineAndIndent\", \"Enter\": false, \"Tab\": \"indentAuto\",\r\n\r\n    \"Alt-G\": function(cm) {cm.setOption(\"keyMap\", \"emacs-Alt-G\");},\r\n    \"Ctrl-X\": function(cm) {cm.setOption(\"keyMap\", \"emacs-Ctrl-X\");},\r\n    \"Ctrl-Q\": function(cm) {cm.setOption(\"keyMap\", \"emacs-Ctrl-Q\");},\r\n    \"Ctrl-U\": addPrefixMap\r\n  };\r\n\r\n  CodeMirror.keyMap[\"emacs-Ctrl-X\"] = {\r\n    \"Tab\": function(cm) {\r\n      cm.indentSelection(getPrefix(cm, true) || cm.getOption(\"indentUnit\"));\r\n    },\r\n    \"Ctrl-X\": function(cm) {\r\n      cm.setSelection(cm.getCursor(\"head\"), cm.getCursor(\"anchor\"));\r\n    },\r\n\r\n    \"Ctrl-S\": \"save\", \"Ctrl-W\": \"save\", \"S\": \"saveAll\", \"F\": \"open\", \"U\": repeated(\"undo\"), \"K\": \"close\",\r\n    \"Delete\": function(cm) { kill(cm, cm.getCursor(), bySentence(cm, cm.getCursor(), 1), true);             "text": "/*\\\r\ntitle: $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/filesystem/filesystemadaptor.js\r\ntype: application/javascript\r\nmodule-type: syncadaptor\r\n\r\nA sync adaptor module for synchronising with the local filesystem via node.js APIs \r\n\r\n\\*/\r\n(function(){\r\n\r\n/*jslint node: true, browser: true */\r\n/*global $tw: false */\r\n\"use strict\";\r\n\r\n// Get a reference to the file undefined;\r\n\t\treturn this.watchers[filename] = this.watchers[filename] ||\r\n\t\t\tfs.watch(filename, {persistent: false}, function(e) {\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\tif(tiddlers[t].title) {\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t$tw.wiki.addTiddler(tiddlers[t]);\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t\t});\r\n\t}\r\n\r\n\tfor(var f in $tw.boot.files) the array of existing filenames\r\n*/\r\nFileSystemAdaptor.prototype.generateTiddlerFilename = function(title,extension,existingFilenames) {\r\n\t// First remove any of the characters that are illegal in Windows filenames\r\n\tvar baseFilename = title.replace(/\\<|\\>|\\:|\\\"|\\/|\\\\|\\||\\?|\\*|\\^/g,\"_\");\r\n\t// Truncate the filename if it is too long\r\n\tif(baseFilename.length > 200)         "$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/tiddlyweb/tiddlywebadaptor.js": {
            "text": "/*\\\r\ntitle: $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/tiddlyweb/tiddlywebadaptor.js\r\ntype: application/javascript\r\nmodule-type: syncadaptor\r\n\r\nA sync adaptor module for synchronising with TiddlyWeb compatible servers \r\n\r\n\\*/\r\n(function(){\r\n\r\n/*jslint node: true, browser: true */\r\n/*global $tw: false */\r\n\"use strict\";\r\n\r\nvar CONFIG_HOST_TIDDLER = \"$:/config/tiddlyweb/host\",\r\n\tDEFAULT_HOST_TIDDLER = \"$protocol$//$host$/\";\r\n\r\nfunction TiddlyWebAdaptor(syncer) {\r\n\tthis.syncer = syncer;\r\n\tthis.host = this.getHost();\r\n\tthis.recipe = undefined;\r\n\tthis.logger = new $tw.utils.Logger(\"TiddlyWebAdaptor\");\r\n}\r\n\r\nTiddlyWebAdaptor.prototype.getHost = function() {\r\n\tvar text = this.syncer.wiki.getTiddlerText(CONFIG_HOST_TIDDLER,DEFAULT_HOST_TIDDLER),\r\n\t\tsubstitutions = [\r\n\t\t\t{name: \"protocol\", value: document.location.protocol},\r\n\t\t\t{name: \"host\", value: document.location.host}\r\n\t\t];\r\n\tfor(var t=0; t<substitutions.length; t++) {\r\n\t\tvar s = substitutions[t];\r\n\t\ttext = text.replace(new RegExp(\"\\\\$\" + s.name + \"\\\\$\",\"mg\"),s.value);\r\n\t}\r\n\treturn text;\r\n};\r\n\r\nTiddlyWebAdaptor.prototype.getTiddlerInfo = function(tiddler) {\r\n\treturn {\r\n\t\tbag: tiddler.fields[\"bag\"]\r\n\t};\r\n};\r\n\r\n/*\r\nGet the current status of the TiddlyWeb connection\r\n*/\r\nTiddlyWebAdaptor.prototype.getStatus = function(callback) {\r\n\t// Get status\r\n\tvar self = this,\r\n\t\twiki = self.syncer.wiki;\r\n\tthis.logger.log(\"Getting status\");\r\n\t$tw.utils.httpRequest({\r\n\t\turl: this.host + \"status\",\r\n\t\tcallback: function(err,data) {\r\n\t\t\tif(err) {\r\n\t\t\t\treturn callback(err);\r\n\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t\t// Decode the status JSON\r\n\t\t\tvar json = null,\r\n\t\t\t\tisLoggedIn = false;\r\n\t\t\ttry {\r\n\t\t\t\tjson = JSON.parse(data);\r\n\t\t\t} catch (e) {\r\n\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t\tif(json) {\r\n\t\t\t\tself.logger.log(\"Status:\",data);\r\n\t\t\t\t// Record the recipe\r\n\t\t\t\tif(json.space) {\r\n\t\t\t\t\tself.recipe = json.space.recipe;\r\n\t\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t\t\t// Check if we're logged in\r\n\t\t\t\tisLoggedIn = json.username !== \"GUEST\";\r\n\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t\t// Invoke the callback if present\r\n\t\t\tif(callback) {\r\n\t\t\t\tcallback(null,isLoggedIn,json.username);\r\n\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t}\r\n\t});\r\n};\r\n\r\n/*\r\nAttempt to login and invoke the callback(err)\r\n*/\r\nTiddlyWebAdaptor.prototype.login = function(username,password,callback) {\r\n\tvar options = {\r\n\t\turl: this.host + \"challenge/tiddlywebplugins.tiddlyspace.cookie_form\",\r\n\t\ttype: \"POST\",\r\n\t\tdata: {\r\n\t\t\tuser: username,\r\n\t\t\tpassword: password,\r\n\t\t\ttiddlyweb_redirect: \"/status\" // workaround to marginalize automatic subsequent GET\r\n\t\t},\r\n\t\tcallback: function(err) {\r\n\t\t\tcallback(err);\r\n\t\t}\r\n\t};\r\n\tthis.logger.log(\"Logging in:\",options);\r\n\t$tw.utils.httpRequest(options);\r\n};\r\n\r\n/*\r\n*/\r\nTiddlyWebAdaptor.prototype.logout = function(callback) {\r\n\tvar options = {\r\n\t\turl: this.host + \"logout\",\r\n\t\ttype: \"POST\",\r\n\t\tdata: {\r\n\t\t\tcsrf_token: this.getCsrfToken(),\r\n\t\t\ttiddlyweb_redirect: \"/status\" // workaround to marginalize automatic subsequent GET\r\n\t\t},\r\n\t\tcallback: function(err,data) {\r\n\t\t\tcallback(err);\r\n\t\t}\r\n\t};\r\n\tthis.logger.log(\"Logging out:\",options);\r\n\t$tw.utils.httpRequest(options);\r\n};\r\n\r\n/*\r\nRetrieve the CSRF token from its cookie\r\n*/\r\nTiddlyWebAdaptor.prototype.getCsrfToken = function() {\r\n\tvar regex = /^(?:.*; )?csrf_token=([^(;|$)]*)(?:;|$)/,\r\n\t\tmatch = regex.exec(document.cookie),\r\n\t\tcsrf = null;\r\n\tif (match && (match.length === 2)) {\r\n\t\tcsrf = match[1];\r\n\t}\r\n\treturn csrf;\r\n};\r\n\r\n/*\r\nGet an array of skinny tiddler fields from the server\r\n*/\r\nTiddlyWebAdaptor.prototype.getSkinnyTiddlers = function(callback) {\r\n\tvar self = this;\r\n\t$tw.utils.httpRequest({\r\n\t\turl: this.host + \"recipes/\" + this.recipe + \"/tiddlers.json\",\r\n\t\tcallback: function(err,data) {\r\n\t\t\t// Check for errors\r\n\t\t\tif(err) {\r\n\t\t\t\treturn callback(err);\r\n\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t\t// Process the tiddlers to make sure the revision is a string\r\n\t\t\tvar tiddlers = JSON.parse(data);\r\n\t\t\tfor(var t=0; t<tiddlers.length; t++) {\r\n\t\t\t\ttiddlers[t] = self.convertTiddlerFromTiddlyWebFormat(tiddlers[t]);\r\n\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t\t// Invoke the callback with the skinny tiddlers\r\n\t\t\tcallback(null,tiddlers);\r\n\t\t}\r\n\t});\r\n};\r\n\r\n/*\r\nSave a tiddler and invoke the callback with (err,adaptorInfo,revision)\r\n*/\r\nTiddlyWebAdaptor.prototype.saveTiddler = function(tiddler,callback) {\r\n\tvar self = this;\r\n\t$tw.utils.httpRequest({\r\n\t\turl: this.host + \"recipes/\" + encodeURIComponent(this.recipe) + \"/tiddlers/\" + encodeURIComponent(tiddler.fields.title),\r\n\t\ttype: \"PUT\",\r\n\t\theaders: {\r\n\t\t\t\"Content-type\": \"application/json\"\r\n\t\t},\r\n\t\tdata: this.convertTiddlerToTiddlyWebFormat(tiddler),\r\n\t\tcallback: function(err,data,request) {\r\n\t\t\tif(err) {\r\n\t\t\t\treturn callback(err);\r\n\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t\t// Save the details of the new revision of the tiddler\r\n\t\t\tvar etagInfo = self.parseEtag(request.getResponseHeader(\"Etag\"));\r\n\t\t\t// Invoke the callback\r\n\t\t\tcallback(null,{\r\n\t\t\t\tbag: etagInfo.bag\r\n\t\t\t}, etagInfo.revision);\t\r\n\t\t}\r\n\t});\r\n};\r\n\r\n/*\r\nLoad a tiddler and invoke the callback with (err,tiddlerFields)\r\n*/\r\nTiddlyWebAdaptor.prototype.loadTiddler = function(title,callback) {\r\n\tvar self = this;\r\n\t$tw.utils.httpRequest({\r\n\t\turl: this.host + \"recipes/\" + encodeURIComponent(this.recipe) + \"/tiddlers/\" + encodeURIComponent(title),\r\n\t\tcallback: function(err,data,request) {\r\n\t\t\tif(err) {\r\n\t\t\t\treturn callback(err);\r\n\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t\t// Invoke the callback\r\n\t\t\tcallback(null,self.convertTiddlerFromTiddlyWebFormat(JSON.parse(data)));\r\n\t\t}\r\n\t});\r\n};\r\n\r\n/*\r\nDelete a tiddler and invoke the callback with (err)\r\n*/\r\nTiddlyWebAdaptor.prototype.deleteTiddler = function(title,callback) {\r\n\tvar self = this,\r\n\t\tbag = this.syncer.tiddlerInfo[title].adaptorInfo.bag;\r\n\t// If we don't have a bag it means that the tiddler hasn't been seen by the server, so we don't need to delete it\r\n\tif(!bag) {\r\n\t\treturn callback(null);\r\n\t}\r\n\t// Issue HTTP request to delete the tiddler\r\n\t$tw.utils.httpRequest({\r\n\t\turl: this.host + \"bags/\" + encodeURIComponent(bag) + \"/tiddlers/\" + encodeURIComponent(title),\r\n\t\ttype: \"DELETE\",\r\n\t\tcallback: function(err,data,request) {\r\n\t\t\tif(err) {\r\n\t\t\t\treturn callback(err);\r\n\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t\t// Invoke the callback\r\n\t\t\tcallback(null);\r\n\t\t}\r\n\t});\r\n};\r\n\r\n/*\r\nConvert a tiddler to a field set suitable for PUTting to TiddlyWeb\r\n*/\r\nTiddlyWebAdaptor.prototype.convertTiddlerToTiddlyWebFormat = function(tiddler) {\r\n\tvar result = {},\r\n\t\tknownFields = [\r\n\t\t\t\"bag\", \"created\", \"creator\", \"modified\", \"modifier\", \"permissions\", \"recipe\", \"revision\", \"tags\", \"text\", \"title\", \"type\", \"uri\"\r\n\t\t];\r\n\tif(tiddler) {\r\n\t\t$tw.utils.each(tiddler.fields,function(fieldValue,fieldName) {\r\n\t\t\tvar fieldString = fieldName === \"tags\" ?\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\ttiddler.fields.tags :\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\ttiddler.getFieldString(fieldName); // Tags must be passed as an array, not a string\r\n\r\n\t\t\tif(knownFields.indexOf(fieldName) !== -1) {\r\n\t\t\t\t// If it's a known field, just copy it across\r\n\t\t\t\tresult[fieldName] = fieldString;\r\n\t\t\t} else {\r\n\t\t\t\t// If it's unknown, put it in the \"fields\" field\r\n\t\t\t\tresult.fields = result.fields || {};\r\n\t\t\t\tresult.fields[fieldName] = fieldString;\r\n\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t});\r\n\t}\r\n\t// Default the content type and convert the type \"text/x-tiddlywiki\" into null\r\n\tif(result.type === \"text/x-tiddlywiki\") {\r\n\t\tresult.type = null;\r\n\t};\r\n\tresult.type = result.type || \"text/vnd.tiddlywiki\";\r\n\treturn JSON.stringify(result,null,$tw.config.preferences.jsonSpaces);\r\n};\r\n\r\n/*\r\nConvert a field set in TiddlyWeb format into ordinary TiddlyWiki5 format\r\n*/\r\nTiddlyWebAdaptor.prototype.convertTiddlerFromTiddlyWebFormat = function(tiddlerFields) {\r\n\tvar self = this,\r\n\t\tresult = {};\r\n\t// Transfer the fields, pulling down the `fields` hashmap\r\n\t$tw.utils.each(tiddlerFields,function(element,title,object) {\r\n\t\tif(title === \"fields\") {\r\n\t\t\t$tw.utils.each(element,function(element,subTitle,object) {\r\n\t\t\t\tresult[subTitle] = element;\r\n\t\t\t});\r\n\t\t} else {\r\n\t\t\tresult[title] = tiddlerFields[title];\r\n\t\t}\r\n\t});\r\n\t// Make sure the revision is expressed as a string\r\n\tif(typeof result.revision === \"number\") {\r\n\t\tresult.revision = result.revision.toString();\r\n\t}\r\n\t// Some unholy freaking of content types\r\n\tif(result.type === \"text/javascript\") {\r\n\t\tresult.type = \"application/javascript\";\r\n\t} else if(!result.type || result.type === \"None\") {\r\n\t\tresult.type = \"text/x-tiddlywiki\";\r\n\t}\r\n\treturn result;\r\n};\r\n\r\n/*\r\nSplit a TiddlyWeb Etag into its constituent parts. For example:\r\n\r\n```\r\n\"system-images_public/unsyncedIcon/946151:9f11c278ccde3a3149f339f4a1db80dd4369fc04\"\r\n```\r\n\r\nNote that the value includes the opening and closing double quotes.\r\n\r\nThe parts are:\r\n\r\n```\r\n<bag>/<title>/<revision>:<hash>\r\n```\r\n*/\r\nTiddlyWebAdaptor.prototype.parseEtag = function(etag) {\r\n\tvar firstSlash = etag.indexOf(\"/\"),\r\n\t\tlastSlash = etag.lastIndexOf(\"/\"),\r\n\t\tcolon = etag.lastIndexOf(\":\");\r\n\tif(firstSlash === -1 || lastSlash === -1 || colon === -1) {\r\n\t\treturn null;\r\n\t} else {\r\n\t\treturn {\r\n\t\t\tbag: decodeURIComponent(etag.substring(1,firstSlash)),\r\n\t\t\ttitle: decodeURIComponent(etag.substring(firstSlash + 1,lastSlash)),\r\n\t\t\trevision: etag.substring(lastSlash + 1,colon)\r\n\t\t};\r\n\t}\r\n};\r\n\r\nif($tw.browser && document.location.protocol.substr(0,4) === \"http\" ) {\r\n\texports.adaptorClass = TiddlyWebAdaptor;\r\n}\r\n\r\n})();\r\n",
            "title": "$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/tiddlyweb/tiddlywebadaptor.js",
            "type": "application/javascript",
            "module-type": "syncadaptor"
        }
    }
}

    "tiddlers": {
        "$:/plugins/welford/htalink/link": {
            "title": "$:/plugins/welford/htalink/link",
            "type": "application/javascript",
            "module-type": "browser-startup",
            "text": "function findParentWithClass(node,classNames) {\r\n\tclassNames = classNames.split(\" \");\r\n\twhile(node) {\r\n\t\tif(node.classList) {\r\n\t\t\tfor(var t=0; t<classNames.length; t++) {\r\n\t\t\t\tif(node.classList.contains(classNames[t])) {\r\n\t\t\t\t\treturn node;\r\n\t\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t}\r\n\t\tnode = node.parentNode;\r\n\t}\r\n\treturn null;\r\n}\n\nfunction trapLinks(doc) {\r\n\tdoc.addEventListener(\"click\",function(event) {\r\n\t\t//leave this here for now incase it is useful later\r\n\t\t// See if we're in an interwiki link\r\n\t\t//var interwikiLink = findParentWithClass(event.target,\"tw-interwiki-link\");\t\t\r\n\t\t//if(interwikiLink) {\r\n\t\t\t//openWikiIfNotOpen(interwikiLink.href);\r\n\t\t\t//event.preventDefault();\r\n\t\t\t//event.stopPropagation();\r\n\t\t\t//return false;\r\n\t\t\t//alert(\"derp\");\r\n\t\t//}\r\n\t\t// See if we're in an external link\r\n\t\t// \"tw-tiddlylink-external\" is for TW5, \"externallink\" for TWC\r\n\t\tvar externalLink = findParentWithClass(event.target,\"tw-tiddlylink-external externalLink\");\r\n\t\tif(externalLink) {\r\n\t\t\ttry{\r\n\t\t\t\tvar shell = new ActiveXObject(\"WScript.Shell\");\r\n\t\t\t\tshell.run(externalLink.href);\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\tevent.preventDefault();\r\n\t\t\t\tevent.stopPropagation();\r\n\t\t\t\treturn false;\r\n\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t\tcatch (err) {\r\n\t\t\t\t//silent failure\r\n\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t}\r\n\t\treturn true;\r\n\t},false);\r\n}\n\ntrapLinks(document);\t"

        "$:/plugins/welford/twexe/drop": {
            "title": "$:/plugins/welford/twexe/drop",
            "tags": "twexe",
            "text": "<$dropzone>\r\n<div style=\"height:100px;border:2px dashed red\"></div>\r\n</$dropzone>\r\n"

        "$:/plugins/welford/twexe/twdropzone.js": {
            "text": "/*\\\r\ntitle: $:/plugins/welford/twexe/twdropzone.js\r\ntype: application/javascript\r\nmodule-type: widget\r\n\r\nCustom Dropzone widget, creates TWEXE tiddlers when files are dropped here\r\n\r\n\\*/\r\n(function(){\r\n\r\n/*jslint node: true, browser: true */\r\n/*global $tw: false */\r\n\"use strict\";\r\n\r\nvar Widget = require(\"$:/core/modules/widgets/widget.js\").widget;\r\n\r\nvar TWDropZoneWidget = function(parseTreeNode,options) {\r\n\tthis.initialise(parseTreeNode,options);\r\n};\r\n\r\n/*\r\nInherit from the base widget class\r\n*/\r\nTWDropZoneWidget.prototype = new Widget();\r\n\r\n/*\r\nRender this widget into the DOM\r\n*/\r\nTWDropZoneWidget.prototype.render = function (parent, nextSibling) {\r\n\tvar self = this;\r\n\t// Remember parent\r\n\tthis.parentDomNode = parent;\r\n\t// Compute attributes and execute state\r\n\tthis.computeAttributes();\r\n\tthis.execute();\r\n\t// Create element\r\n\tvar domNode = this.document.createElement(\"div\");\r\n\tdomNode.className = \"tw-dropzone\";\r\n\t// Add event handlers\r\n\t$tw.utils.addEventListeners(domNode,[\r\n\t\t{name: \"dragenter\", handlerObject: this, handlerMethod: \"handleDragEnterEvent\"},\r\n\t\t{name: \"dragover\", handlerObject: this, handlerMethod: \"handleDragOverEvent\"},\r\n\t\t{name: \"dragleave\", handlerObject: this, handlerMethod: \"handleDragLeaveEvent\"},\r\n\t\t{name: \"drop\", handlerObject: this, handlerMethod: \"handleDropEvent\"},\r\n\t\t{name: \"paste\", handlerObject: this, handlerMethod: \"handlePasteEvent\"}\r\n\t]);\r\n\tdomNode.addEventListener(\"click\",function (event) {\r\n\t},false);\r\n\t// Insert element\r\n\tparent.insertBefore(domNode,nextSibling);\r\n\tthis.renderChildren(domNode,null);\r\n\tthis.domNodes.push(domNode);\r\n};\r\n\r\nTWDropZoneWidget.prototype.handleDragEnterEvent = function (event) {\r\n\t// We count enter/leave events\r\n\tthis.dragEnterCount = (this.dragEnterCount || 0) + 1;\r\n\t// If we're entering for the first time we need to apply highlighting\r\n\tif(this.dragEnterCount === 1) {\r\n\t\t$tw.utils.addClass(this.domNodes[0],\"tw-dragover\");\r\n\t}\r\n\t// Tell the browser that we're ready to handle the drop\r\n\tevent.preventDefault();\r\n\t// Tell the browser not to ripple the drag up to any parent drop handlers\r\n\tevent.stopPropagation();\r\n};\r\n\r\nTWDropZoneWidget.prototype.handleDragOverEvent = function (event) {\r\n\t// Tell the browser that we're still interested in the drop\r\n\tevent.preventDefault();\r\n\tevent.dataTransfer.dropEffect = \"copy\"; // Explicitly show this is a copy\r\n};\r\n\r\nTWDropZoneWidget.prototype.handleDragLeaveEvent = function (event) {\r\n\t// Reduce the enter count\r\n\tthis.dragEnterCount = (this.dragEnterCount || 0) - 1;\r\n\t// Remove highlighting if we're leaving externally\r\n\tif(this.dragEnterCount <= 0) {\r\n\t\t$tw.utils.removeClass(this.domNodes[0],\"tw-dragover\");\r\n\t}\r\n};\r\n\r\nTWDropZoneWidget.prototype.handleDropEvent = function (event) {\r\n\tvar self = this,\r\n\t\tdataTransfer = event.dataTransfer;\r\n\t// Reset the enter count\r\n\tthis.dragEnterCount = 0;\r\n\t// Remove highlighting\r\n\t$tw.utils.removeClass(this.domNodes[0],\"tw-dragover\");\r\n\t// Import any files in the drop\r\n\tvar numFiles = this.wiki.readFiles(dataTransfer.files,function(tiddlerFieldsArray) {\r\n\t\t//format the dropped tiddlers \t\t\r\n\t\tfor(var t=0; t<tiddlerFieldsArray.length; t++) {\r\n\t\t\ttiddlerFieldsArray[t].tags = \"[[$:/tags/twexe]]\";\r\n\t\t\ttiddlerFieldsArray[t].text = \"explanation here\";\r\n\t\t\ttiddlerFieldsArray[t].type = undefined;\r\n\t\t\ttiddlerFieldsArray[t].twexe_target = \"path here\";\r\n\t\t\ttiddlerFieldsArray[t].twexe_name = tiddlerFieldsArray[t].title;\r\n\t\t\ttiddlerFieldsArray[t].twexe_cwd = \".\\\\\";\r\n\t\t}\r\n\t\tself.dispatchEvent({type: \"tw-import-tiddlers\", param: JSON.stringify(tiddlerFieldsArray)});\t\t\r\n\t});\r\n\t// Try to import the various data types we understand\r\n\tif(numFiles === 0) {\r\n\t\tthis.importData(dataTransfer);\r\n\t}\r\n\t// Tell the browser that we handled the drop\r\n\tevent.preventDefault();\r\n\t// Stop the drop ripple up to any parent handlers\r\n\tevent.stopPropagation();\r\n};\r\n\r\nTWDropZoneWidget.prototype.importData = function (dataTransfer) {\r\n\t// Try each provided data type in turn\r\n\tfor(var t=0; t<this.importDataTypes.length; t++) {\r\n\t\tif(!$tw.browser.isIE || this.importDataTypes[t].IECompatible) {\r\n\t\t\t// Get the data\r\n\t\t\tvar dataType = this.importDataTypes[t];\r\n\t\t\t\tvar data = dataTransfer.getData(dataType.type);\r\n\t\t\t// Import the tiddlers in the data\r\n\t\t\tif(data !== \"\" && data !== null) {\r\n\t\t\t\tvar tiddlerFields = dataType.convertToFields(data);\r\n\t\t\t\tif(!tiddlerFields.title) {\r\n\t\t\t\t\ttiddlerFields.title = this.wiki.generateNewTitle(\"Untitled\");\r\n\t\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t\t\tthis.dispatchEvent({type: \"tw-import-tiddlers\", param: JSON.stringify([tiddlerFields])});\r\n\t\t\t\treturn;\r\n\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t}\r\n\t};\r\n};\r\n\r\nTWDropZoneWidget.prototype.importDataTypes = [\r\n\t{type: \"text/vnd.tiddler\", IECompatible: false, convertToFields: function(data) {\r\n\t\treturn JSON.parse(data);\r\n\t}},\r\n\t{type: \"URL\", IECompatible: true, convertToFields: function(data) {\r\n\t\t// Check for tiddler data URI\r\n\t\tvar match = decodeURI(data).match(/^data\\:text\\/vnd\\.tiddler,(.*)/i);\r\n\t\tif(match) {\r\n\t\t\treturn JSON.parse(match[1]);\r\n\t\t} else {\r\n\t\t\treturn { // As URL string\r\n\t\t\t\ttext: data\r\n\t\t\t};\r\n\t\t}\r\n\t}},\r\n\t{type: \"text/x-moz-url\", IECompatible: false, convertToFields: function(data) {\r\n\t\t// Check for tiddler data URI\r\n\t\tvar match = decodeURI(data).match(/^data\\:text\\/vnd\\.tiddler,(.*)/i);\r\n\t\tif(match) {\r\n\t\t\treturn JSON.parse(match[1]);\r\n\t\t} else {\r\n\t\t\treturn { // As URL string\r\n\t\t\t\ttext: data\r\n\t\t\t};\r\n\t\t}\r\n\t}},\r\n\t{type: \"text/html\", IECompatible: false, convertToFields: function(data) {\r\n\t\treturn {\r\n\t\t\ttext: data\r\n\t\t};\r\n\t}},\r\n\t{type: \"text/plain\", IECompatible: false, convertToFields: function(data) {\r\n\t\treturn {\r\n\t\t\ttext: data\r\n\t\t};\r\n\t}},\r\n\t{type: \"Text\", IECompatible: true, convertToFields: function(data) {\r\n\t\treturn {\r\n\t\t\ttext: data\r\n\t\t};\r\n\t}},\r\n\t{type: \"text/uri-list\", IECompatible: false, convertToFields: function(data) {\r\n\t\treturn {\r\n\t\t\ttext: data\r\n\t\t};\r\n\t}}\r\n];\r\n\r\nTWDropZoneWidget.prototype.handlePasteEvent = function (event) {\r\n\t// Let the browser handle it if we're in a textarea or input box\r\n\tif([\"TEXTAREA\",\"INPUT\"].indexOf(event.target.tagName) == -1) {\r\n\t\tvar self = this,\r\n\t\t\titems = event.clipboardData.items;\r\n\t\t// Enumerate the clipboard items\r\n\t\tfor(var t = 0; t<items.length; t++) {\r\n\t\t\tvar item = items[t];\r\n\t\t\tif(item.kind === \"file\") {\r\n\t\t\t\t// Import any files\r\n\t\t\t\tthis.wiki.readFile(item.getAsFile(),function(tiddlerFieldsArray) {\r\n\t\t\t\t\tself.dispatchEvent({type: \"tw-import-tiddlers\", param: JSON.stringify(tiddlerFieldsArray)});\r\n\t\t\t\t});\r\n\t\t\t} else if(item.kind === \"string\") {\r\n\t\t\t\t// Create tiddlers from string items\r\n\t\t\t\titem.getAsString(function(str) {\r\n\t\t\t\t\tvar tiddlerFields = {\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\ttitle: self.wiki.generateNewTitle(\"Untitled\"),\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\ttext: str\r\n\t\t\t\t\t};\r\n\t\t\t\t\tself.dispatchEvent({type: \"tw-import-tiddlers\", param: JSON.stringify([tiddlerFields])});\r\n\t\t\t\t});\r\n\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t}\r\n\t\t// Tell the browser that we've handled the paste\r\n\t\tevent.stopPropagation();\r\n\t\tevent.preventDefault();\r\n\t}\r\n};\r\n\r\n/*\r\nCompute the internal state of the widget\r\n*/\r\nTWDropZoneWidget.prototype.execute = function ()         "$:/plugins/welford/twexe/template": {

        "$:/plugins/welford/twexe/twexe.js": {
            "text": "/*\\\r\ntitle: $:/plugins/welford/twexe/twexe.js\r\ntype: application/javascript\r\nmodule-type: widget\r\n\r\ntwexe widget\r\n\\*/\r\n(function(){\r\n/*jslint node: true, browser: true */\r\n/*global $tw: false */\r\n//\"use strict\";\r\nvar target_file_field\t= \"twexe_target\";\r\nvar button_name_field\t= \"twexe_title\";\r\nvar cwd_field\t\t\t= \"twexe_cwd\";\r\n\r\nfunction mouseX(evt) {\r\n\tif (evt.pageX) {\r\n\t\treturn evt.pageX;\r\n\t} else if (evt.clientX) {\r\n\t\treturn evt.clientX + (document.documentElement.scrollLeft ?\r\n\t\t\tdocument.documentElement.scrollLeft :\r\n\t\t\tdocument.body.scrollLeft);\r\n\t} else {\r\n\t\treturn null;\r\n\t}\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction mouseY(evt) {\r\n\tif (evt.pageY) {\r\n\t\treturn evt.pageY;\r\n\t} else if (evt.clientY) {\r\n\t\treturn evt.clientY + (document.documentElement.scrollTop ?\r\n\t\tdocument.documentElement.scrollTop :\r\n\t\tdocument.body.scrollTop);\r\n\t} else {\r\n\t\treturn null;\r\n\t}\r\n}\r\n\r\nvar Widget = require(\"$:/core/modules/widgets/widget.js\").widget;\r\n\r\nvar TWExeWidget = function(parseTreeNode,options) {\r\n\t\t\t\tevent.target.click();\r\n\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t\tTWExeWidget.context_menu.style.display = \"None\";\r\n\t\t};\r\n\t}\r\n};\r\n\r\n/*\r\nInherit from the base widget class\r\n*/\r\nTWExeWidget.prototype = new Widget();\r\n\r\n/*\r\nset class variables\tinitally to null, we will create them when we first get the chance\r\n*/\r\nTWExeWidget.context_menu = null;\r\nTWExeWidget.explorer = null;\r\nTWExeWidget.clipboard = null;\r\nTWExeWidget.open_tiddler = null;\r\nTWExeWidget.open_tiddler_args = null;\r\n\r\n\r\nTWExeWidget.prototype.GetLatestDetails = function ()\r\n{\r\n\tthis.target = this.getAttribute(\"target\", null);\r\n\tthis.name = this.getAttribute(\"name\", null);\r\n\tthis.comment = this.getAttribute(\"comment\", null);\r\n\tthis.cwd = tiddler...\r\n\r\n\t//get defaults for things that are not set\r\n\tsource_tid = this.wiki.getTiddler(this.src_tiddler);\r\n\tif (source_tid) {\r\n\t\t//set button target if not set already\r\n\t\tif {\r\n\t\t\tthis.hasActiveX = false;\r\n\t\t}\r\n\t}\r\n}\r\n\r\n/*\r\nRender this widget into the DOM\r\n*/\r\nTWExeWidget.prototype.render = function (parent,nextSibling) {\r\n\t// Remember self.target.split(\"\\\\\").join(\"/\") );\r\n\t}\r\n\t// Add a click event handler\r\n\tbutton.addEventListener(\"click\", function (event) {\t\t\r\n\t\tif (self.target) {\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\tself.GetLatestDetails(); //update details\r\n\t\t\tself.runFile(event);\r\n\t\t\tevent.preventDefault();\r\n\t\t\tevent.stopPropagation();\r\n\t\t\treturn true;\r\n\t\t}\r\n\t\treturn event listeners\r\n\t\tvar old_element = TWExeWidget.explorer;\r\n\t\tvar new_element = old_element.cloneNode(true);\r\n\t\told_element.parentNode.replaceChild(new_element, ActiveXObject(\"WScript.Shell\");\r\n\t\t\tWshShell.Run(\"explorer /e, \" + path);\t\t\r\n\t\t} else {\r\n\t\t\tvar WshShell = new ActiveXObject(\"WScript.Shell\");\r\n\t\t\tWshShell.Run(\"explorer /select, \" + path );\r\n\t\t}\t\t\r\n\t}\r\n\telse {\r\n\t\talert(\"file parameter incorrectly set\")\r\n\t}\r\n};\r\n\r\nTWExeWidget.prototype.copyToClip = function (event) {\r\n\tif (this.target) {\r\n\t\talert(\"file parameter not set\")\r\n\t}\r\n};\r\n\r\nTWExeWidget.prototype.OpenTiddler = function (event,name) {\t\r\n\tvar bounds = bounds.bottom, height: bounds.height\r\n\t\t},\r\n\t\tnavigateSuppressNavigation: event.metaKey || event.ctrlKey || (event.button === 1)\r\n\t});\r\n};\r\n\r\n/*\r\nCompute the internal state of the widgets\r\n\tthis.makeChildWidgets();\t\r\n};\r\n\r\n/*\r\nSelectively refreshes the widget if needed.             "title": "$:/plugins/welford/twexe/viewtemplate",

    "tiddlers": {
        "$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/base": {
            "title": "$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/base",
            "tags": "[[$:/tags/stylesheet]]",
            "text": "\\rules only filteredtranscludeinline transcludeinline macrodef macrocallinline\r\n/*\r\n** Start with the normalize CSS reset, and then belay some of its 1px solid <<colour code-border>>;\r\n    white-space: pre-wrap;\r\n\tpadding: 0 3px 2px;\r\n\tborder-radius: 3px;\r\n}\n\nblockquote {\r\n\tborder-left: 5px solid <<colour elements\r\n*/\r\npre > code {\r\n\tpadding: 0;\r\n\tborder: none;\r\n\tbackground-color: inherit;\r\n\tcolor: inherit;\r\n}\n\ntable {\r\n\tborder: 1px solid <<colour table-border>>;\r\n\twidth: {\r\n\t\tposition: relative;\r\n\t\twidth: 50%;\r\n\t\tmargin: 30px auto;\r\n\t}\r\n}\n\n.modal-header {\r\n\tpadding: 9px 15px;\r\n\tborder-bottom: 1px solid <<colour 15px;\r\n\tmargin-bottom: 0;\r\n\ttext-align: right;\r\n\tbackground-color: <<colour modal-footer-background>>;\r\n\tborder-top: 1px solid <<colour modal-footer-border>>;\r\n}\n\n/*\r\n** Notifications\r\n*/\n\n.tw-notification {\r\n\tposition: fixed;\r\n\ttop: 14px;\r\n\tright: 42px;\r\n\tz-index: 1000;\r\n\tmax-width: 280px;\r\n\tpadding: 0 14px 0 14px;\r\n\tbackground-color: <<colour notification-background>>;\r\n\tborder: 1px solid <<colour notification-border>>;\r\n}\n\n/*\r\n** Tabs\r\n*/\n\n.tw-tab-set.tw-vertical {\r\n\tdisplay: -webkit-flex;\r\n\tdisplay: flex;\r\n}\n\n.tw-tab-buttons {\r\n\tfont-size: 0.85em;\r\n\tpadding-top: 1em;\r\n\tmargin-bottom: -1px;\r\n}\n\n.tw-tab-buttons.tw-vertical  {\r\n\tz-index: 100;\r\n\tdisplay: block;\r\n\tpadding-top: 14px;\r\n\tvertical-align: top;\r\n\ttext-align: right;\r\n\tmargin-bottom: inherit;\r\n\tmargin-right: -1px;\r\n\tmax-width: 33%;\r\n\t-webkit-flex: 0 0 auto;\r\n\tflex: 0 0 auto;\r\n}\n\n.tw-tab-buttons button.tw-tab-selected {\r\n\tcolor: <<colour tab-foreground-selected>>;\r\n\tbackground-color: <<colour tab-background-selected>>;\r\n\tborder-left: 1px solid <<colour tab-border-selected>>;\r\n\tborder-top: 1px solid <<colour tab-border-selected>>;\r\n\tborder-right: 1px solid <<colour tab-border-selected>>;\r\n}\n\n.tw-tab-buttons button {\r\n\tcolor: <<colour tab-foreground>>;\r\n\tpadding: 3px 5px 3px 5px;\r\n\tfont-weight: 300;\r\n\tborder: none;\r\n\tbackground: inherit;\r\n\tbackground-color: <<colour tab-background>>;\r\n\tborder-left: 1px solid <<colour tab-border>>;\r\n\tborder-top: 1px solid <<colour tab-border>>;\r\n\tborder-right: 1px solid <<colour tab-border>>;\r\n}\n\n.tw-tab-buttons.tw-vertical button {\r\n\tdisplay: block;\r\n\twidth: 100%;\r\n\tmargin-top: 3px;\r\n\ttext-align: right;\r\n\tbackground-color: <<colour tab-background>>;\r\n\tborder-left: 1px solid <<colour tab-border>>;\r\n\tborder-bottom: 1px solid <<colour tab-border>>;\r\n\tborder-right: none;\r\n}\n\n.tw-tab-buttons.tw-vertical button.tw-tab-selected {\r\n\tbackground-color: <<colour tab-background-selected>>;\r\n\tborder-right: 1px solid <<colour tab-background-selected>>;\r\n}\n\n.tw-tab-divider {\r\n\tborder-top: 1px solid <<colour tab-divider>>;\r\n}\n\n.tw-tab-divider.tw-vertical  {\r\n\tdisplay: none;\r\n}\n\n.tw-tab-content {\r\n\tmargin-top: 14px;\r\n}\n\n.tw-tab-content.tw-vertical  {\r\n\tdisplay: inline-block;\r\n\tvertical-align: top;\r\n\tpadding-top: 0;\r\n\tpadding-left: 14px;\r\n\tborder-left: 1px solid <<colour tab-border>>;\r\n\t-webkit-flex: 0 0 70%;\r\n\tflex: 0 0 70%;\r\n}\n\n.tw-sidebar-lists .tw-tab-buttons button.tw-tab-selected {\r\n\tbackground-color: <<colour sidebar-tab-background-selected>>;\r\n\tcolor: <<colour sidebar-tab-foreground-selected>>;\r\n\tborder-left: 1px solid <<colour sidebar-tab-border-selected>>;\r\n\tborder-top: 1px solid <<colour sidebar-tab-border-selected>>;\r\n\tborder-right: 1px solid <<colour sidebar-tab-border-selected>>;\r\n}\n\n.tw-sidebar-lists .tw-tab-buttons button {\r\n\tbackground-color: <<colour sidebar-tab-background>>;\r\n\tcolor: <<colour sidebar-tab-foreground>>;\r\n\tborder-left: 1px solid <<colour sidebar-tab-border>>;\r\n\tborder-top: 1px solid <<colour sidebar-tab-border>>;\r\n\tborder-right: 1px solid <<colour sidebar-tab-border>>;\r\n}\n\n.tw-sidebar-lists .tw-tab-divider {\r\n\tborder-top: 1px solid <<colour sidebar-tab-divider>>;\r\n}\n\n.tw-more-sidebar .tw-tab-buttons button {\r\n\tbackground-color: <<colour sidebar-tab-background>>;\r\n\tborder-top: none;\r\n\tborder-left: none;\r\n\tborder-bottom: none;\r\n\tborder-right: 1px solid #ccc;\r\n\tmargin-bottom: inherit;\r\n}\n\n.tw-more-sidebar .tw-tab-buttons button.tw-tab-selected {\r\n\tbackground-color: <<colour sidebar-tab-background-selected>>;\r\n\tborder: none;\r\n}\n\n/*\r\n** Alerts\r\n*/\n\n.tw-alerts {\r\n\tposition: fixed;\r\n\ttop: 0;\r\n\tleft: 0;\r\n\tmax-width: 500px;\r\n\tz-index: 20000;\r\n}\n\n.tw-alert {\r\n\tposition: relative;\r\n\tmargin: 28px;\r\n\tpadding: 14px 14px 14px 14px;\r\n\tborder: 2px solid <<colour alert-border>>;\r\n\tbackground-color: <<colour alert-background>>;\r\n}\n\n.tw-alert-toolbar {\r\n\tposition: absolute;\r\n\ttop: 14px;\r\n\tright: 14px;\r\n}\n\n.tw-alert-toolbar svg {\r\n\tfill: <<colour alert-muted-foreground>>;\r\n}\n\n.tw-alert-subtitle {\r\n\tcolor: <<colour alert-muted-foreground>>;\r\n\tfont-weight: bold;\r\n}\n\n.tw-alert-highlight {\r\n\tcolor: <<colour alert-highlight>>;\t\r\n}\n\n.tw-static-alert {\r\n\tposition: relative;\r\n}\n\n.tw-static-alert-inner {\r\n\tpadding: 0 2px 2px 42px;\r\n\tcolor: <<colour static-alert-foreground>>;\r\n\tposition: absolute;\r\n}\n\n/*\r\n** Grids\r\n*/\n\n.tw-grid-frame td {\r\n\twidth: 1em;\r\n\theight: 1em;\r\n}\n\n/*\r\n** Control panel\r\n*/\n\n.tw-control-panel td {\r\n\tpadding: 4px;\r\n}\n\n.tw-control-panel table, .tw-control-panel table input, .tw-control-panel table textarea {\r\n\twidth: 100%;\r\n}\n\n/*\r\n** Message boxes\r\n*/\n\n.tw-message-box {\r\n\tborder: 1px message-foreground>>;\r\n}\n\n.tw-message-box img {\r\n\tfloat: right;\r\n\twidth: 150px;\r\n\tmargin: 0px 0px 12px 12px;\r\n}\n\n/*\r\n** Chooser\r\n*/\n\n.tw-chooser {\r\n\tborder: 1px solid {\r\n\tdisplay: inline-block;\r\n}\n\n.tw-swatch {\r\n\twidth: 2em;\r\n\theight: 2em;\r\n\tmargin: 4px;\r\n\tborder: 1px solid #000;\r\n}\n\n/*\r\n** Table of contents\r\n*/\n\n.tw-sidebar-lists .tw-table-of-contents {\r\n\twhite-space: nowrap;\r\n}\n\n.tw-table-of-contents svg {\r\n\twidth: 0.7em;\r\n\theight: 0.7em;\r\n\tvertical-align: middle;\r\n}\n\n.tw-table-of-contents ol {\r\n\tlist-style-type: none;\r\n\tpadding-left: 0;\r\n}\n\n.tw-table-of-contents ol ol {\r\n\tpadding-left: 1em;\r\n}\n\n.tw-table-of-contents li {\r\n\tfont-size: 1.0em;\r\n\tfont-weight: 1.4;\r\n}\n\n.tw-table-of-contents li li a {\r\n\tfont-weight: normal;\r\n}\n\n.tw-table-of-contents li li li {\r\n\tfont-size: 0.95em;\r\n\tfont-weight: 200;\r\n\tline-height: 1.5;\r\n}\n\n.tw-table-of-contents li li li a {\r\n\tfont-weight: bold;\r\n}\n\n.tw-table-of-contents li li li li {\r\n\tfont-size: 0.95em;\r\n\tfont-weight: 200;\r\n}\r\n"

        "$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/reset": {
            "title": "$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/reset",
            "type": "text/plain",
            "text": "/*! normalize.css v3.0.0 | MIT License | git.io/normalize */\n\n/**\r\n * 1. Set default font family to sans-serif.\r\n * 2. Prevent iOS text size adjust after orientation change, without disabling\r\n *    user zoom.\r\n */\n\nhtml {\r\n  font-family: sans-serif; /* 1 */\r\n  -ms-text-size-adjust: 100%; /* 2 */\r\n  -webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%; /* 2 */\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Remove default margin.\r\n */\n\nbody {\r\n  margin: 0;\r\n}\n\n/* HTML5 display definitions\r\n   ========================================================================== */\n\n/**\r\n * Correct `block` display not defined in IE 8/9.\r\n */\n\narticle,\r\naside,\r\ndetails,\r\nfigcaption,\r\nfigure,\r\nfooter,\r\nheader,\r\nhgroup,\r\nmain,\r\nnav,\r\nsection,\r\nsummary {\r\n  display: block;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * 1. Correct `inline-block` display not defined in IE 8/9.\r\n * 2. Normalize vertical alignment of `progress` in Chrome, Firefox, and Opera.\r\n */\n\naudio,\r\ncanvas,\r\nprogress,\r\nvideo {\r\n  display: inline-block; /* 1 */\r\n  vertical-align: baseline; /* 2 */\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Prevent modern browsers from displaying `audio` without controls.\r\n * Remove excess height in iOS 5 devices.\r\n */\n\naudio:not([controls]) {\r\n  display: none;\r\n  height: 0;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Address `[hidden]` styling not present in IE 8/9.\r\n * Hide the `template` element in IE, Safari, and Firefox < 22.\r\n */\n\n[hidden],\r\ntemplate {\r\n  display: none;\r\n}\n\n/* Links\r\n   ========================================================================== */\n\n/**\r\n * Remove the gray background color from active links in IE 10.\r\n */\n\na {\r\n  background: transparent;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Improve readability when focused and also mouse hovered in all browsers.\r\n */\n\na:active,\r\na:hover {\r\n  outline: 0;\r\n}\n\n/* Text-level semantics\r\n   ========================================================================== */\n\n/**\r\n * Address styling not present in IE 8/9, Safari 5, and Chrome.\r\n */\n\nabbr[title] {\r\n  border-bottom: 1px dotted;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Address style set to `bolder` in Firefox 4+, Safari 5, and Chrome.\r\n */\n\nb,\r\nstrong {\r\n  font-weight: bold;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Address styling not present in Safari 5 and Chrome.\r\n */\n\ndfn {\r\n  font-style: italic;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Address variable `h1` font-size and margin within `section` and `article`\r\n * contexts in Firefox 4+, Safari 5, and Chrome.\r\n */\n\nh1 {\r\n  font-size: 2em;\r\n  margin: 0.67em 0;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Address styling not present in IE 8/9.\r\n */\n\nmark {\r\n  background: #ff0;\r\n  color: #000;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Address inconsistent and variable font size in all browsers.\r\n */\n\nsmall {\r\n  font-size: 80%;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Prevent `sub` and `sup` affecting `line-height` in all browsers.\r\n */\n\nsub,\r\nsup {\r\n  font-size: 75%;\r\n  line-height: 0;\r\n  position: relative;\r\n  vertical-align: baseline;\r\n}\n\nsup {\r\n  top: -0.5em;\r\n}\n\nsub {\r\n  bottom: -0.25em;\r\n}\n\n/* Embedded content\r\n   ========================================================================== */\n\n/**\r\n * Remove border when inside `a` element in IE 8/9.\r\n */\n\nimg {\r\n  border: 0;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Correct overflow displayed oddly in IE 9.\r\n */\n\nsvg:not(:root) {\r\n  overflow: hidden;\r\n}\n\n/* Grouping content\r\n   ========================================================================== */\n\n/**\r\n * Address margin not present in IE 8/9 and Safari 5.\r\n */\n\nfigure {\r\n  margin: 1em 40px;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Address differences between Firefox and other browsers.\r\n */\n\nhr {\r\n  -moz-box-sizing: content-box;\r\n  box-sizing: content-box;\r\n  height: 0;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Contain overflow in all browsers.\r\n */\n\npre {\r\n  overflow: auto;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Address odd `em`-unit font size rendering in all browsers.\r\n */\n\ncode,\r\nkbd,\r\npre,\r\nsamp {\r\n  font-family: monospace, monospace;\r\n  font-size: 1em;\r\n}\n\n/* Forms\r\n   ========================================================================== */\n\n/**\r\n * Known limitation: by default, Chrome and Safari on OS X allow very limited\r\n * styling of `select`, unless a `border` property is set.\r\n */\n\n/**\r\n * 1. Correct color not being inherited.\r\n *    Known issue: affects color of disabled elements.\r\n * 2. Correct font properties not being inherited.\r\n * 3. Address margins set differently in Firefox 4+, Safari 5, and Chrome.\r\n */\n\nbutton,\r\ninput,\r\noptgroup,\r\nselect,\r\ntextarea {\r\n  color: inherit; /* 1 */\r\n  font: inherit; /* 2 */\r\n  margin: 0; /* 3 */\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Address `overflow` set to `hidden` in IE 8/9/10.\r\n */\n\nbutton {\r\n  overflow: visible;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Address inconsistent `text-transform` inheritance for `button` and `select`.\r\n * All other form control elements do not inherit `text-transform` values.\r\n * Correct `button` style inheritance in Firefox, IE 8+, and Opera\r\n * Correct `select` style inheritance in Firefox.\r\n */\n\nbutton,\r\nselect {\r\n  text-transform: none;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * 1. Avoid the WebKit bug in Android 4.0.* where (2) destroys native `audio`\r\n *    and `video` controls.\r\n * 2. Correct inability to style clickable `input` types in iOS.\r\n * 3. Improve usability and consistency of cursor style between image-type\r\n *    `input` and others.\r\n */\n\nbutton,\r\nhtml input[type=\"button\"], /* 1 */\r\ninput[type=\"reset\"],\r\ninput[type=\"submit\"] {\r\n  -webkit-appearance: button; /* 2 */\r\n  cursor: pointer; /* 3 */\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Re-set default cursor for disabled elements.\r\n */\n\nbutton[disabled],\r\nhtml input[disabled] {\r\n  cursor: default;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Remove inner padding and border in Firefox 4+.\r\n */\n\nbutton::-moz-focus-inner,\r\ninput::-moz-focus-inner {\r\n  border: 0;\r\n  padding: 0;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Address Firefox 4+ setting `line-height` on `input` using `!important` in\r\n * the UA stylesheet.\r\n */\n\ninput {\r\n  line-height: normal;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * It's recommended that you don't attempt to style these elements.\r\n * Firefox's implementation doesn't respect box-sizing, padding, or width.\r\n *\r\n * 1. Address box sizing set to `content-box` in IE 8/9/10.\r\n * 2. Remove excess padding in IE 8/9/10.\r\n */\n\ninput[type=\"checkbox\"],\r\ninput[type=\"radio\"] {\r\n  box-sizing: border-box; /* 1 */\r\n  padding: 0; /* 2 */\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Fix the cursor style for Chrome's increment/decrement buttons. For certain\r\n * `font-size` values of the `input`, it causes the cursor style of the\r\n * decrement button to change from `default` to `text`.\r\n */\n\ninput[type=\"number\"]::-webkit-inner-spin-button,\r\ninput[type=\"number\"]::-webkit-outer-spin-button {\r\n  height: auto;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * 1. Address `appearance` set to `searchfield` in Safari 5 and Chrome.\r\n * 2. Address `box-sizing` set to `border-box` in Safari 5 and Chrome\r\n *    (include `-moz` to future-proof).\r\n */\n\ninput[type=\"search\"] {\r\n  -webkit-appearance: textfield; /* 1 */\r\n  -moz-box-sizing: content-box;\r\n  -webkit-box-sizing: content-box; /* 2 */\r\n  box-sizing: content-box;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Remove inner padding and search cancel button in Safari and Chrome on OS X.\r\n * Safari (but not Chrome) clips the cancel button when the search input has\r\n * padding (and `textfield` appearance).\r\n */\n\ninput[type=\"search\"]::-webkit-search-cancel-button,\r\ninput[type=\"search\"]::-webkit-search-decoration {\r\n  -webkit-appearance: none;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Define consistent border, margin, and padding.\r\n */\n\nfieldset {\r\n  border: 1px solid #c0c0c0;\r\n  margin: 0 2px;\r\n  padding: 0.35em 0.625em 0.75em;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * 1. Correct `color` not being inherited in IE 8/9.\r\n * 2. Remove padding so people aren't caught out if they zero out fieldsets.\r\n */\n\nlegend {\r\n  border: 0; /* 1 */\r\n  padding: 0; /* 2 */\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Remove default vertical scrollbar in IE 8/9.\r\n */\n\ntextarea {\r\n  overflow: auto;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Don't inherit the `font-weight` (applied by a rule above).\r\n * NOTE: the default cannot safely be changed in Chrome and Safari on OS X.\r\n */\n\noptgroup {\r\n  font-weight: bold;\r\n}\n\n/* Tables\r\n   ========================================================================== */\n\n/**\r\n * Remove most spacing between table cells.\r\n */\n\ntable {\r\n  border-collapse: collapse;\r\n  border-spacing: 0;\r\n}\n\ntd,\r\nth {\r\n  padding: 0;\r\n}\r\n"
        },
        "$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/fontfamily": {
            "title": "$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/fontfamily",
            "text": "\"Helvetica Neue\", Helvetica, Arial, \"Lucida Grande\", sans-serif"

        "$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/themetweaks": {
            "title": "$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/themetweaks",
            "tags": "$:/tags/ControlPanel/Appearance",
            "caption": "Theme Tweaks",
            "text": "You can tweak certain aspects of the ''Vanilla'' theme.\n\n! Settings\n\n* Font family: <$edit-text tiddler=\"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/fontfamily\" default=\"\" tag=\"input\"/>\n\n! Sizes\n\n* Font size: <$edit-text tiddler=\"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/fontsize\" default=\"\" tag=\"input\"/>\r\n* Line height: <$edit-text tiddler=\"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/lineheight\" default=\"\" tag=\"input\"/>\r\n* Story left position //(the distance between the left of the screen and the left margin of the story river or tiddler area)//: <$edit-text tiddler=\"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storyleft\" default=\"\" tag=\"input\"/>\r\n* Story top position //(the distance between the top of the screen ad the top margin of the story river or tiddler area)//: <$edit-text tiddler=\"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storytop\" default=\"\" tag=\"input\"/>\r\n* Story right //(the distance between the left side of the screen and the left margin of the sidebar area)//: <$edit-text tiddler=\"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storyright\" default=\"\" tag=\"input\"/>\r\n* Story width //(the width of the story river or tiddler area)//: <$edit-text tiddler=\"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storywidth\" default=\"\" tag=\"input\"/>\r\n* Tiddler width //(the width of individual tiddlers -- used for zoomin storyview)//: <$edit-text tiddler=\"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/tiddlerwidth\" default=\"\" tag=\"input\"/>\r\n* Sidebar breakpoint //(the minimum width for the sidebar to be displayed above the story river)//: <$edit-text tiddler=\"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint\" default=\"\" tag=\"input\"/>\r\n"
        }
    }
}






fontsize: `14px`
lineheight: `20px`
storyleft: `0px`
storytop: `0px`
storyright: `770px`
storywidth: `970px`
tiddlerwidth: `686px`

    "tiddlers": {
        "$:/themes/welford/phasersonkill/base": {
            "title": "$:/themes/welford/phasersonkill/base",
            "tags": "[[$:/tags/stylesheet]]",
